name: Kifree
description:
In-browser doesn't work, to play the game please download the files below

Two birds, trapped in a lab must escape together on the search for...

FREEDOM

While together step on the freeze block to launch the Penguin

Click on obstacles to help the Penguin avoid them while fending off enemies as Kiwi

Use A and D to move left and right respectively

Space to Jump

Shift to Attack

W to break the rope while Penguin is on the freeze block

The Penguin flies at the direction at the time

Click on objects with Left Click to make them activate

Game made by:
Kristen Stuffs (She/Her)- Game Designer/Level Designer/Page Editor

MushroomManToad (He/Him)- Coder

Pretender8 (They/Them)- Artist

Additional Credits:

m5x7 and m6x11 by Daniel Lessen
EDG77 by ENDESGA

Game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021
Game fits the theme by not only having the characters interconnected, but your attention is connected too as the player has to deal with 2 styles of gameplay at once.
